name: Through Salt and Sand Demo
description:
In a world with an unknown history, what paths will you choose to discover the secrets of the ancient islands you find yourself upon.  TSaS is a choose your own adventure game with multiple stories and endings.  You play as Sihm, a young girl with a burning sense of adventure and an ache for discovery.  Join her  and a various cast of characters while you uncover the history and folklore of the world. The demo contains two of the planned five stories.

There's no embargo on the demo, feel free to stream or upload your Let's Play and be sure to leave a comment!
